data.name: plNameField.Help
data.value: Enter the name of the Contact

data.name: valName.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter a Valid Name

data.name: plRoleField.Help
data.value: Enter the role of the Contact

data.name: plEmailField.Help
data.value: Enter the email address of the Contact

data.name: plContact2Field.Help
data.value: Enter an alternate telephone number for the Contact

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the Contacts Module

The Contact module renders contact information for a group of people, for example a project team. Each contact record includes the Contact's name, role, email address and two telephone numbers. The Contact's email address automatically renders as a 'mailto' hyperlink (the link is cloaked to prevent harvesting by spambots).

Add a Contact

  1. Add a Contacts module, or go to an existing Contacts module.
  2. Click Add New Contact.
  3. At Name, enter the title, first name and last name of the contact. E.g. Ms Lorraine Young.
  4. At Role (optional), enter the contact's role within the group. E.g. Project Manager.
  5. At Email (optional), enter the contact's email address. E.g. lorraine.young@mydomain.com.
  6. At Telephone 1 (optional), enter the contact's primary telephone number.
  7. At Telephone 2 (optional), enter the contact's secondary or mobile number.
  8. Click Update.
